Package com.lmax.solana4j.api

Interface MessageVisitor.Version0MessageView

All Superinterfaces:
MessageVisitor.MessageView
Enclosing interface:
MessageVisitor<T>
public static interface MessageVisitor.Version0MessageView extends MessageVisitor.MessageView
Interface representing a view of a version 0 message in the Solana blockchain.

This interface extends the MessageVisitor.LegacyMessageView and provides additional methods specific to version 0 messages, which include advanced features such as account lookup tables.

  • Method Details

    • version

      int version()
      Retrieves the version number of this message.
      Returns:
      the version number of the message, expected to be 0 for version 0 messages

    • accountLookups

      List<MessageVisitor.AccountLookupView> accountLookups()
      Retrieves the list of account lookups in the message.

      Account lookup tables help optimize the transaction by referencing accounts indirectly, allowing for more efficient and flexible transaction structures.

      Returns:
      a list of MessageVisitor.AccountLookupView objects representing the account lookups in the message

    • instructions

      List<MessageVisitor.V0InstructionView> instructions()
      Retrieves the list of instructions included in this version 0 message.
      Returns:
      a list of MessageVisitor.V0InstructionView objects representing the instructions in the version 0 message

    • isWriter

      boolean isWriter(PublicKey account, List<AddressLookupTable> addressLookupTables) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Checks if the specified account is designated as a writer in this version 0 message.

      This method checks both static accounts and accounts referenced via the provided address lookup tables to determine if the account has write access.

      Parameters:
      account - the public key of the account to check
      addressLookupTables - the list of address lookup tables to consult when determining if the account is a writer
      Returns:
      true if the account is a writer, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the address lookup tables provided do not map to any of the lookup accounts in the message

    • allAccounts

      List<PublicKey> allAccounts(List<AddressLookupTable> addressLookupTables) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Retrieves the list of all accounts, including both static and lookup accounts.
      Parameters:
      addressLookupTables - the list of address lookup tables to include
      Returns:
      a list of PublicKey objects representing all accounts
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the address lookup tables provided do not map to any of the lookup accounts in the message
